category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA84_save_extobject_under_parentitem
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to have TCAA set attached reference links to be stored by default under the same item revision of the related referencing documents. Possible values: 0 - attached reference links are set to be stored under separate Item Revisions (Default) 1 - attached reference links are set to be stored under the same Item Revision of the referencing drawing
